body_html: I suppose it might be possible for foldr to work on binary functions whose two inputs need not have the same dimensions, but this might have unfortunate consequences for shape inference. @mrry would we welcome a contribution of that kind?
body_text: I suppose it might be possible for foldr to work on binary functions whose two inputs need not have the same dimensions, but this might have unfortunate consequences for shape inference.  @mrry would we welcome a contribution of that kind?
body: I suppose it might be possible for foldr to work on binary functions whose two inputs need not have the same dimensions, but this might have unfortunate consequences for shape inference.  @mrry would we welcome a contribution of that kind?
